name: Real Life: life simulator game
description:
Real Life - a new life simulator game. Play idle sim: try on different roles, grow up, reach success and go from poor to rich!

Immerse into the virtual life of this idle sim - make different decisions, adopt any lifestyle, go from poor to rich, aim for a career of success and fame and engage in exciting situations. This is a simulator game and you are the one to decide your fate.

CREATE YOUR OWN IDENTITY
Only you choose who to become: your actions influence your appearance, cleverness, health and happiness! Will you be a homeless artist or a startup entrepreneur?

RELIVE YOUR CHILDHOOD
Grow up, go to school, join clubs. Study hard or make childhood friends and find your first love!

BECOME WHOEVER YOU WANT
Get a job, go from poor to rich and build a career of success: be a famous artist, a well-known lawyer, an entrepreneur, or even a Hollywood star! Become a professional to earn a fortune, invest and buy luxury things. Try on any job in the career simulator and find your talent.

BUILD RELATIONSHIPS
Date, choose your partner and fall in love with them. Start your own family, have kids and see them grow up!

CHOOSE ANY LIFESTYLE
The world is yours to make any decisions and create a new dream life simulation. Spin a fortune wheel and see what virtual life has prepared for you this time. Try different simulation paths, play the game and get anything you want: from a cute pet to a luxury penthouse - this is your lifestyle!

Whether you are a kid or an adult you’ll enjoy roleplaying different personalities and trying various life simulation scenarios!

Play Real Life idle sim: aim high and reach success in the virtual life of new simulation games.
